amendment.description: To require the submittal of a survey on perchlorate contamination at Department of Defense sites.

vote.text: Amendment SA 824 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 824 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S6901-6902; text: CR S6901) To require the submittal of a survey on perchlorate contamination at Department of Defense sites.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 824 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 824 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
